title: Show stale indicator in search results

brief.why: Stale sources appear in search without indication that their path is invalid, causing confusion
brief.what: Add [stale] marker to search output for sources with status=stale
brief.done: Search results show [stale] indicator, optionally filter with --include-stale or --exclude-stale

brief.why: Backfill is a catch-up operation that spawns subprocess per source. Extracting during /close uses tokens already being spent, has richer context, and eliminates the backfill queue entirely.
brief.what: 1. Add store-extraction call to /close skill after handoff write 2. Use HYBRID_EXTRACTION_PROMPT in-context (no subprocess needed) 3. Pipe result to mem store-extraction 4. Test with a real /close cycle
brief.done: New sessions get extractions at close time. Backfill queue stays empty without manual runs.
